titles.title: National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2019
To modify the proof of concept commercialization program of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Intelligence and Emerging Threats and Capabilities.

bill.summary:
National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2019
This bill extends through FY2024 and otherwise revises the Department of Defense's Proof of Concept Commercialization Pilot Program (which accelerates commercialization of basic research innovations). The program must focus on priority defense technology areas that attract public funding and private-sector investment.
